00019 #include "DataSetWriter.h"
00020 
00021 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00022 
00023 DataSetWriter::DataSetWriter(std::ofstream* s, DataSetHeader* d) 
00024 {
00025         os = s; 
00026         dataSetHdr = d;
00027         columnCnt = dataSetHdr->GetColumnCnt();
00028         columnIdx = 0;
00029         rowIdx = 0;
00030         rowCnt = dataSetHdr->GetRowCnt();
00031 }
00032 
00033 void DataSetWriter::WriteHeader()
00034 {
00035         hdrWriter.Write(*os, *dataSetHdr);
00036         u_int32_t currentPos = os->tellp();
00037         dataSetHdr->SetDataStartFilePos(currentPos);
00038         hdrWriter.UpdateDataOffset(*os, currentPos);
00039 }
00040 
00041 void DataSetWriter::UpdateNextDataSetOffset() const
00042 {
00043         u_int32_t currentPos = os->tellp();
00044         dataSetHdr->SetNextSetFilePos(currentPos);
00045         hdrWriter.UpdateNextDataSetOffset(*os, currentPos);
00046 }
00047 
00048 std::wstring DataSetWriter::GetDataSetName() const
00049 {
00050         return dataSetHdr->GetName();
00051 }
00052 
00053 int32_t DataSetWriter::GetDataSetSize() const
00054 {
00055         return dataSetHdr->GetDataSize();
00056 }
00057 
00058 void DataSetWriter::Write(int8_t p)
00059 {
00060         FileOutput::WriteInt8(*os, p);
00061 }
00062 
00063 void DataSetWriter::Write(u_int8_t p)
00064 {
00065         FileOutput::WriteUInt8(*os, p);

00088 void DataSetWriter::Write(float p)
00089 {

00093 void DataSetWriter::Write(const std::string &p, int32_t maxLn)
00094 {
00095         FileOutput::WriteString8(*os, p, maxLn);
00096 }
00097 
00098 void DataSetWriter::Write(const std::wstring &p, int32_t maxLn)
00099 {
00100         FileOutput::WriteString16(*os, p, maxLn);
